title: No Defense (4U28)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (3) to place a [Dunland] token here. Skirmish: Spot a [Dunland] Man and remove a [Dunland] token from this card. A character skirmishing that [Dunland] Man does not gain strength bonuses from possessions.
Rarity:	U
